address: Xã Bình Giang, Huyện Hòn Đất, Tỉnh Kiên Giang
thought:
**Determining the Current Administrative Unit for "Xã Bình Giang"**

Okay, so the user wants to know the current administrative unit for "Xã Bình Giang, Huyện Hòn Đất, Tỉnh Kiên Giang."  My initial thought is, this seems straightforward, given my knowledge of Vietnamese administrative changes. First, I have to clarify the province.  I know "Tỉnh Kiên Giang" underwent a consolidation.  I immediately recall Resolution 60-NQ/TW, which merged "Kiên Giang" and "An Giang" into "An Giang."  Therefore, the problem is now about finding the equivalent for "Xã Bình Giang" within "Tỉnh An Giang."

My approach is systematic. I will first look for any resolutions relating to administrative rearrangements within "Tỉnh An Giang." I'll specifically focus on any mention of "Xã Bình Giang." I will also consult the "New wards" data.

My initial search of "Other resolutions" for "Xã Bình Giang" and "An Giang" led me to `1654/NQ-UBTVQH15`.  Interestingly, this resolution outlines the rearrangement of administrative units within An Giang.  I carefully examined the relevant sections. Line 73 describes the amalgamation of specific wards into "Xã Hòn Đất." Not relevant. However, line 97 is crucial. It explicitly states that "Xã Bình Giang" is one of the "06 xã không thực hiện sắp xếp."  This immediately confirms that "Xã Bình Giang" retained its name and status.

To be absolutely sure, I checked the "New wards" data.  I was pleased to find an entry: `{"ward_code":"30826","ward_name":"Xã Bình Giang","province_name":"Tỉnh An Giang"}`. This directly confirms the continued existence of "Xã Bình Giang" within "Tỉnh An Giang."

Therefore, based on the specific resolution and the "New wards" data, I'm confident in my conclusion. The original "Xã Bình Giang, Huyện Hòn Đất, Tỉnh Kiên Giang" translates directly to "Xã Bình Giang, Tỉnh An Giang."  The confidence is high due to the explicit language of the resolution. This is a simple case of a province merger that didn't affect the ward itself.

citation.header: 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh An Giang
citation.line: 97. Sau khi sắp xếp, tỉnh An Giang có 102 đơn vị hành chính cấp xã, gồm 85 xã, 14 phường và 03 đặc khu; trong đó có 79 xã, 14 phường, 03 đặc khu hình thành sau sắp xếp quy định tại Điều này và 06 xã không thực hiện sắp xếp là các xã Mỹ Hòa Hưng, Bình Giang, Bình Sơn, Hòn Nghệ, Sơn Hải, Tiên Hải.
